title: $662 MONSTER Lobster MOUNTAIN: 50 Pounds!!!
description:
This was the reason I went to Toronto, for this 50 POUND / 23 KILOGRAM LOBSTER MOUNTAIN! These were twin lobsters fried & delicious Strictly Dumpling T-Shirts HERE: http://bit.ly/2IVM2ts

LOCATION
https://www.yelp.com/biz/fishman-lobster-clubhouse-restaurant-toronto


➨Get tickets to the best show on earth!!! http://bit.ly/2gu7REI


►Subscribe for MORE videos about food! http://bit.ly/1hsxh41
